metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14696 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
SaltStack Salt before 2016.3.8, 2016.11.x before 2016.11.8, and 2017.7.xbefore 2017.7.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via acrafted authentication request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14696` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-api - 2017.7.4+dfsg1-1
salt-cloud - 2017.7.4+dfsg1-1
salt-common - 2017.7.4+dfsg1-1
salt-master - 2017.7.4+dfsg1-1
salt-minion - 2017.7.4+dfsg1-1
salt-proxy - 2017.7.4+dfsg1-1
salt-ssh - 2017.7.4+dfsg1-1
salt-syndic - 2017.7.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: salt package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2017.7.4+dfsg1-1').
